title: Voxic Shock 1.6: Rep. Thad McCotter
author: VD
content_html: In this week’s podcast, I speak with Congressman Thad McCotter (R-MI) about his newly declared campaign for the Republican nomination for president.  Longtime readers may recall I previously interviewed Rep. McCotter during the financial crisis of 2008.
content_text:
In
this week’s podcast
, I speak with Congressman Thad McCotter (R-MI) about his newly declared campaign for the Republican nomination for president.  Longtime readers may recall I
previously interviewed Rep. McCotter
during the financial crisis of 2008.
